article_node.title: Inflation Risks; Trump Says India Offered to Cut its Tariffs to 'Nothing'
article_node.summary: US equity futures and Treasury yields fell as markets reacted to a busy jobs data week. President Trump announced that India had offered to cut its 50% tariffs on U.S. goods to zero, a move that could ease trade tensions. Analysts noted that the U.S. economy may be more resilient than expected, potentially dampening Fed rate hikes, while investors remain cautious about a future market reckoning.
